marketNews.title: BI Holds Interest Rates, Prediction of Slower FFR Cuts
marketNews.content: Bank Indonesia on Wednesday (11/20) [decided](https://www.bi.go.id/id/publikasi/ruang-media/news-release/Pages/sp_2625424.aspx) to maintain the benchmark interest rate, BI Rate, at 6%, with the deposit facility and lending facility also maintained at 5.25% and 6.75%, respectively. This decision is in line with consensus expectations. Bank Indonesia Governor, Perry Warjiyo, stated that this decision aims to strengthen the stability of the Rupiah exchange rate amid global geopolitical and economic uncertainty, especially with the strengthening of the US dollar following Donald Trump's victory in the US presidential election. Perry mentioned that the weakening of the Rupiah against the US dollar was primarily triggered by the strengthening of the US Dollar Index (DXY) due to the [_inflationary policy plan_](https://snips.stockbit.com/snips-terbaru/indeks-dolar-as-menguat-ke-level-tertinggi-dalam-1-tahun) promoted by Trump. Furthermore, Perry stated that The Fed's interest rate cuts will be limited as the US economy is projected to remain good in 2025. Perry mentioned that BI still expects a Fed rate cut of -25 bps in December 2024. However, for 2025, Bank Indonesia now only expects a Fed rate cut of -50 bps, lower than the previous projection of -75-100 bps. For comparison, Bank Indonesia's latest projection is in line with market expectations from the [CME FedWatch Tool](https://www.cmegroup.com/markets/interest-rates/cme-fedwatch-tool.html). Following the declining expectation for The Fed rate cuts, the Indonesian capital market experienced an outflow. Since the beginning of November 2024, the Indonesian bond market has experienced an outflow of 9 trillion Rupiah as of November 13, 2024, while the outflow in the stock market reached 11 trillion Rupiah as of November 19, 2024. The return of foreign funds exiting the Indonesian capital market triggered a weakening of the Rupiah exchange rate against the US dollar by -0.9% MTD to the level of 15,858 per November 20, 2024. Key Takeaway: To mitigate volatility risks from the uncertainty of interest rate direction, investors can take advantage of the opportunity to lock in high and attractive bond yields, especially for short-term series like PBS032. Additionally, the Retail SBN ST013, which is currently in the [offering period](https://blog.bibit.id/blog-1/investasi-di-st013-dan-raih-passive-income-hingga-rp48-juta-per-bulan), can also be an alternative because it has a floating coupon with a floor.

marketNews.title: Bank Indonesia recorded that the growth of banking credit disbursement increased to +10.92% YoY in 10M24
marketNews.content: Bank Indonesia [noted](https://www.bi.go.id/id/publikasi/ruang-media/news-release/Pages/sp_2625424.aspx) that the growth in banking credit disbursement increased to +10.92% YoY in 10M24 (vs. 9M24: +10.85% YoY). Credit growth was primarily supported by investment credit (+13.63% YoY), working capital credit (+9.25% YoY), and consumer credit (+11.01% YoY). Meanwhile, Sharia financing grew by +11.93% YoY during 10M24, and MSME credit growth reached +4.76% YoY. Bank Indonesia projects credit growth in 2024 will be in the range of the target, around +10-12%.

marketNews.title: Ukraine Attacks Russian Arms Depot with US-Made Missiles
marketNews.content: Ukraine attacked a Russian arms depot with US-made missiles on Tuesday (11/19). [This attack](https://edition.cnn.com/2024/11/19/europe/ukraine-russia-atacms-biden-strike-intl/index.html) marked the first time Ukraine used long-range US-made weapons to strike targets inside Russia. Responding to this, the Russian government [said](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/crr91nn9n79o) that Ukraine's use of long-range US-made missiles represented direct US involvement in hostilities against Russia.

marketNews.title: Tax Expert Suggests Cancellation of VAT Hike Implementation
marketNews.content: The Executive Director of Pratama-Kreston Tax Research Institute, Prianto Budi Saptono, [said](https://epaper.kontan.co.id/mobile/harian/2024/11/20) that the government can still cancel the implementation of the Value Added Tax (VAT) increase to 12%. Prianto mentioned at least 2 ways the cancellation can be taken by the government: through a Government Regulation in Lieu of Law (Perppu) or by submitting a draft government regulation regarding the change in the 2025 VAT rate along with the submission of the 2025 State Budget Amendment Bill. Prianto's comments came amidst pressure from the public, including labor and business groups, who are asking the government to cancel and/or postpone the VAT increase.

marketNews.title: IDX Updates Minimum Net Asset Value Rule for Exchange-Traded Funds (ETF)
marketNews.content: The Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX) changed the minimum initial Net Asset Value (NAB) for Collective Investment Contracts (KIK) whose participation units are traded on the IDX (exchange-traded fund/ETF) from 5 billion Rupiah to 1 billion Rupiah. [This regulation](https://www.fortuneidn.com/market/tanayastri/bei-perbarui-aturan-etf-reksa-dana-apa-perubahannya) will take effect on November 15, 2025.

tickerNews.title: ADRO: Additional Dividend Cum Date Set for November 26, 2024
tickerNews.content: ADRO: Adaro Energy Indonesia [announced](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/c23f1b41a5_8c52500b04.pdf) that the additional cum date for the 2023 fiscal year dividend falls on November 26, 2024. The dividend payment will be on December 6, 2024, one day after the planned listing date for Adaro Andalan Indonesia (AADI). Meanwhile, the conversion rate using the Bank Indonesia middle rate and information regarding the dividend value per share will be announced on November 29, 2024.

tickerNews.title: RAJA Reportedly Plans to Bring Subsidiary PT Raharja Energi Cepu to IPO, Targeting Funds Above 1 Trillion Rupiah
tickerNews.content: RAJA: Kontan reported that Rukun Raharja plans to hold an IPO for its subsidiary, PT Raharja Energi Cepu, targeting fund acquisition of approximately 1.6-3.2 trillion Rupiah. A source from [Kontan](https://insight.kontan.co.id/news/raja-dikabarkan-bakal-boyong-anak-usaha-ipo-di-bei-incar-dana-di-atas-rp-1-triliiun) mentioned that the funds acquired by PT Raharja Energi Cepu will be used to take over the participation rights of the Cepu Block from ExxonMobil. Responding to this issue, the Corporate Secretary of RAJA, Yuni Pattinasarani, declined to comment.

tickerNews.title: BBNI October 2024 Net Profit Reaches 1.9 Trillion Rupiah
tickerNews.content: BBNI: Bank Negara Indonesia [recorded](https://www.bni.co.id/Portals/1/BNI/Perusahaan/HubunganInvestor/Docs/2024/LKP_BLN_2024-10_New-SEOJK9_ENG.pdf) a net profit (bank only) of 1.9 trillion Rupiah (-4.6% MoM, +14% YoY) in October 2024. This result brought the bank only net profit for 10M24 to 18.1 trillion Rupiah (+4.3% YoY). Bank only credit for 10M24 grew +8.8% YoY, below management's consolidated FY24 guidance of around +10-12%, with the Loan-to-Deposit Ratio (LDR) rising to 96.1% (+86 bps MoM, +526 bps YoY). Meanwhile, NIM increased to 4.3% (+37 bps MoM, +12 bps YoY) in October 2024, but NIM for 10M24 only reached 3.9% (vs. 10M23: 4.4%) and was still below management's FY24 guidance targeting >=4%. Credit cost (CoC) in October 2024 rose to 1.2% (+33 bps MoM, +8 bps YoY), although CoC for 10M24 remained maintained at 1% and was in line with management's FY24 guidance of Â±1%.

tickerNews.title: ACES October 2024 SSSG +4.8% YoY, 10M24 SSSG Exceeds Guidance
tickerNews.content: ACES: Aspirasi Hidup Indonesia recorded Same Store Sales Growth (SSSG) of +4.8% YoY in October 2024 (vs. September 2024: +8.8% YoY, October 2023: +5.4% YoY). This result brought SSSG for 10M24 to +9.3% YoY (vs. 10M23: +6.8% YoY), above the management's FY24 guidance of +8%. Outside Java (+5.2% YoY) was the region with the highest SSSG growth in October 2024, followed by Java outside Jakarta (+4% YoY) and Jakarta (+2.7% YoY). ACES opened 4 new stores in October 2024, bringing the total new stores for 10M24 to 15 stores.

tickerNews.title: Major Shareholding Changes in STAA: PT Pelita Sukses Sejahtera Acquires Stake, Gani and Lele Tanjung Exit Entirely
tickerNews.content: STAA: Shareholder of Sumber Tani Agung Resources, [PT Pelita Sukses Sejahtera](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/aa94c9f61c_957d314b6c.pdf), purchased 389.3 million (3.57%) shares of STAA at a price of 875 Rupiah per share on November 15, 2024. The total transaction value reached 340.6 billion Rupiah, increasing PT Pelita Sukses Sejahtera's ownership to 6.25%. Meanwhile, 2 shareholders of STAA, [Gani](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/ec2c7c091f_bd274470b2.pdf) and [Lele Tanjung](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/377ec35120_7a5fb42875.pdf), sold 690.7 million (6.34%) shares and 408.8 million (3.75%) shares of STAA, respectively, at a price of 875 Rupiah per share on November 15, 2024. The total transaction values reached 604.4 billion Rupiah and 357.7 billion Rupiah, respectively, causing the ownership of Gani and Lele Tanjung in STAA to drop to 0%.

tickerNews.title: TPIA's Subsidiary Studies Mini-Hydro Power Plant Acquisition and Targets Solar Power Capacity Increase
tickerNews.content: Chandra Asri Pacific, through its business entity, PT Krakatau Chandra Energi, is studying the possibility of acquiring mini-hydro power plants (PLTMH) to increase the company's energy mix capacity in the near future. Nevertheless, the Head of OEM & Services Department of PT Krakatau Chandra Energi, Ermawanto, [stated](https://epaper.bisnis.com/epaper/detail/page/147235/) that they are still finalizing the study for this corporate action. In addition to potential acquisitions, PT Krakatau Chandra Energi also targets an increase in installed solar power plant (PLTS) capacity from the current level of 2.2 MWp to 16 MWp by the end of 2025.

tickerNews.title: BOAT Shareholder Sugiman Halim Increases Stake to 10.5%
tickerNews.content: Newport Marine Services (BOAT) shareholder, Sugiman Halim, purchased 213 million BOAT shares at an average price of 136 Rupiah per share on November 13-14, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 29.1 billion Rupiah. Following [this transaction](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/258d8593c0_ac89d10f63.pdf), Sugiman Halim's ownership in BOAT increased from 4.4% to 10.5%.

tickerNews.title: CBRE Shareholder Herlienna Qisthi Sells Shares, Ownership Drops to 3.7%
tickerNews.content: Cakra Buana Resources Energi (CBRE) shareholder, Herlienna Qisthi, sold 174 million CBRE shares at a price of 25 Rupiah per share on November 15, 2024. The total transaction value reached approximately 4.3 billion Rupiah. Following [this transaction](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/8ad09f2051_3f0958c73d.pdf), Herlienna Qisthi's ownership in CBRE decreased from 7.5% to 3.7%.
